lines.text: Alright, Mel, what happened?
Look, Bernie, take it easy. So you took over the record company, but I'm the producer!
You're the producer, so produce! Sit down!
[Mel sits down]
I got enough riding on these reptiles that go "wee."
That go "wee?"
We've got Cy shooting without a permit and the director's fed up to here!
I told you Cy's the problem! That last video he made, it was a turkey! He's not worth the money we're paying him!
We only raised him five grand, Bernie!
Five grand...
Which leads me to this. Cy's not the problem. It's those Dyna Kids messing up the schedule, acting like video police!
Video police? So get the permit!
Look, we'll finish this video and get it on MTV!
Hang on, bloody there! Otherwise I'm doing my own solo album with Lisa McCormmick! Or maybe even Dinah Shore!
Nigel, sit down! You're exclusive to me! Besides, you can't even sing in English! Now Dinah Shore, now there's a girl with some huge... TALENT for the right video!
PARTY! Hey, man, where's the beer?
[The Bloody Reptiles That Go Wee pop out of the ground]
Great, no beer, and all his friends are guys.
[The lizards and the Dyna Kids fight]
Hey man, what do we do? The store's closed! Anyone got some Ozzy Osbourne?
